org.openwms.common.location.inmem

Class LocationGroupApiImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openwms.common.location.inmem.LocationGroupApiImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocationGroupApi

    @Profile(value="INMEM")
 @TxService
class LocationGroupApiImpl
extends Object
implements LocationGroupApi
    A LocationGroupApiImpl is a Spring managed transactional Service that is activated in case of non-microservice deployments when the Spring Profile INMEM is activated.
    Author:
    Heiko Scherrer
